ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.model.providers
Class ModifyProvider

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.model.providers.ModifyProvider

public class ModifyProvider
extends java.lang.Object

Provides all possible data access options for default data objects like Integer, Float and base types
